page.title: 19TOURISM-CLAYTON CARAVAN PARK
page.content: At Clayton Caravan Park to hire a residential caravan costs Â£312 a year (excluding local authority rates, electricity and gas).If tou bring your own caravan it is only Â£280 per year, Â£72 per month, Â£18 per week or Â£3 to Â£5 daily. The caravan park consists of 50 residential caravans ,116 static holiday caravans and space for touring caravans. There is a Milk Bar serving snacks and a site shop. Clayton gets lots of visitors-most of them Scottish.Only 5% are foreign, 15% from England,Ireland and Wales, and the rest from Scotland (from places like Dundee,Helensburgh, Edinburgh, Ayr, Aberdeen etc.). Most people prefer to use Clayton as a base for golf or siteseeing in the surrounding area of Fife. By Kevin Robertson P6.
